title.full: Double Dragon II  Wander of The Dragons

description.full: This is a remake game of "Double Dragon II" from 1980's game arcade center. Now, this game will be on XBLA.  "Double Dragon II" has story from original game.  However, the graphic, character, action, system etc. has been changed.  Also this game include more new stage and more enemies in the game.   The player will be addicted to new version of Double Dragon II.  This game is based on 1980's background with 3D environment.  The newly developed hard action will lead you to new world of Double Dragon.  Also, characters are say good bye to 1980's style, and recreated with modern style that will amaze you and you can feel the never been experienced world before.
description.short: Double Dragon II - Wander of the Dragons takes you on a hard action game world.  Legend of the side scrolling action game is back! This "Double Dragon II" includes original features from the Double Dragon World.(Story, Characters, Stages, Enhanced Action and Sound & Music from Classic Game.) Real side scrolling "Beat'em up game" is reborn in 21st Century.
